Name: TRAD Arabic-English Mailing lists Parallel corpus - Development set
License: Non Commercial Use - ELRA END USER
Description: This is a parallel corpus of 10,000 words in Arabic and a reference translation in English. The source texts are emails collected from Wikiar-I, a mailing list for discussions about the Arabic Wikipedia. The collected emails are dated from 2004 to 2007.  The translation has been conducted following a strict protocol aimed at producing high quality translations.
